catalog_info.title: Doctoral Colloquium in Religion, Gender, and Culture
catalog_info.notes: Alternate Wednesdays, 4-6 Required for doctoral students in Religion, Gender, and Culture. Interested ThM, MTS, and MDiv students please contact the instructor. May be taken on a Sat/Unsat basis only. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 2690.
catalog_info.description: The Religion, Gender, and Culture Colloquium explores the intersections of feminist theory with feminist theologies and gender studies in religion.
